commit.message:
gthread-jni.c (throw): Call g_snprintf instead of snprintf.

2005-02-19  Thomas Fitzsimmons  <fitzsim@redhat.com>

	* jni/gtk-peer/gthread-jni.c (throw): Call g_snprintf instead of
	snprintf.

From-SVN: r95298
